description: Head straight along the road, keeping the red building and Wellcome supermarket on your left. Continue past the bicycle parking area until you see the Union Plaza entrance. The destination is on the left, marked by a yellow sign located directly below the McDonald's logo.
agent_concise_description: Head straight along the road, keeping the red building and Wellcome supermarket on your left. Continue past the bicycle parking area until you see the Union Plaza entrance. The destination is on the left, marked by a yellow sign located directly below the McDonald's logo.
